General.Name: Zhejiang Zhe Kuang Heavy Industry
General.Description: Zhe Kuang Heavy Industry Co.,Ltd. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and services mining machinery and equipment in China and internationally. The company's products include CJ series jaw, RC series cone crusher, MRC series multi-cylinder cone, and CH-PL series vertical shaft impact crushers; YA and YJS type circular, TYAK oval, and ZJS linear vibrating screen series; GZG and ZWS type double shaft vibrating feeder series; LSX hydraulic dehydration multifunctional compound wheel sand washing machine series; LX sand and gravel washing machine series; WS A series of fine sand recovery devices; intelligent complete solutions for green mines; etc. It also offers equipment in the field of construction and decoration waste recycling and reuse includes intelligent sorting equipment, density sorting equipment, magnetic sorting equipment, and pneumatic sorting equipment, as well as other solutions for construction and decoration waste recycling and reuse. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Zhe Kuang Heavy Industries Co.,Ltd. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Changxing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Weimin  Lin
2.Title: Board Sec., Deputy GM & Non-Independent Director
